title: FS; T3 Turkey Red Eddie Collins

posts.post_title: FS; T3 Turkey Red Eddie Collins
posts.post_content:
***SOLD***

Cabinet is raw. Although there are no guarantee's I think it's a solid 3 and carries the more desirable Turkey Red ad back on the reverse. Super color and eye appeal on this one.

There are a couple small very faint creases on the bottom border that are hard to see, but mentioned for 100% accuracy.

If you like Mr. Collins, please drop me an email. 

Thanks all, Tony

[url]andreatny@q.com[/url]
